remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided Alternate Stabilizer Trim System is verified to be operative before each departure.

numlitem.para: Before each departure, verify the Alternate Stab Trim System is operative:

Using both Alternate Stabilizer Trim Switches located on the control stand, select APL NOSE UP for at least 3 seconds. Monitor stabilizer trim indicator to confirm the stabilizer moves in the nose up direction.

Using both Alternate Stabilizer Trim Switches located on the control stand, select APL NOSE DN for at least 3 seconds. Monitor stabilizer trim indicator to confirm the stabilizer moves in the nose down direction.

note.para: The remaining control wheel stab trim switch may be verified to be operative by applying manual trim input in each direction for at least 3 seconds and observing corresponding stabilizer motion.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "CAPTS (F/O) STAB TRIM SWITCHES INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
